<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_114688</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_114688</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Components of an electromagnetic wave</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bestandteile einer elektromagnetischen Welle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Composants d'une onde électromagnétique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Componentes de uma onda eletromagnética</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Componenti di un'onda elettromagnetica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συστατικά ενός ηλεκτρομαγνητικού κύματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Componentes de una onda electromagnética</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows that an electromagnetic wave has two components: an electric field component and magnetic field component. These components are perpendicular with each other.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electric field</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electromagnetic wave</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic field</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt, daß eine 
elektromagnetische Welle zwei Bestandteile hat: ein elektrisches
fangen Teil auf und magnetisch fangen Sie 
Bestandteil auf. Diese Bestandteile sind mit einander senkrecht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme prouve qu'une onde 
électromagnétique a deux composants : un composant de champ 
électrique et composant de champ magnétique. Ces composants 
sont perpendiculaires avec l'un l'autre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra que uma onda 
eletromagnética tem dois componentes: um componente do campo 
elétrico e componente do campo magnético. Estes componentes 
são perpendiculares com se.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema indica che un'onda elettromagnetica
ha due componenti: un componente del campo elettrico e 
componente del campo magnetico. Questi componenti sono 
perpendicolari con a vicenda.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα δείχνει ότι ένα ηλεκτρομαγνητικό 
κύμα έχει δύο συστατικά: ένα τμήμα ηλεκτρικών πεδίων και
τμήμα μαγνητικών πεδίων. Αυτά τα συστατικά είναι κάθετα 
το ένα με το άλλο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra que una onda 
electromagnética tiene dos componentes: un componente del campo
eléctrico y componente del campo magnético. Estos componentes 
son perpendiculares con uno a.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrisch fangen Sie auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektromagnetische Welle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetisch fangen Sie auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">champ électrique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">onde électromagnétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Lumière</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">champ magnétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">campo elétrico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">onda eletromagnética</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Luz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">campo magnético</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">campo elettrico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">onda elettromagnetica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Luce</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">campo magnetico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλεκτρικό πεδίο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλεκτρομαγνητικό κύμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φως</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μαγνητικό πεδίο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">campo eléctrico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">onda electromagnética</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Luz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">campo magnético</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
